nodes.text: The Department of Adjudication, also called the The Adjudicators, was a law enforcement agency in charge of intervening in economic crime and corruption during the days of the Galactic Republic. The Adjudicators were responsible for unraveling the transgressions of the Czerka Corporation. Legally transferring the conglomerate's assets, the Adjudicators was able to save the galactic economy from collapsing.
